pullRequest.body:
Add `compLeft` which gives `g âˆ˜ f : C_c(Î±, Î³)` from `g : C(Î², Î³)`, `f : C_c(Î±, Î²))`.

---

Split from #20257

```suggestion
@[simps]
def comp_left {Î³ : Type*} [TopologicalSpace Î³] [Zero Î³] {g : C(Î², Î³)} (f : C_c(Î±, Î²))
    (hg : g 0 = 0) : C_c(Î±, Î³) where
```
assuming it does something useful (you can check with `simps?`)
Can you make this return `0` if `g 0 â‰  0`? Then you don't need the `hg` argument
I'm not sure if I understood... I tried to do it, is this what you mean? I had to remove `@[simps]` because it is not a constructor application.
That means you should use `@[simps!]` instead of `@[simps]`
`@[simps!]` fails as well
I meant `@[simps! toContinuousMap]` but I guess it's okay not to have it since the lemmas we want are conditional on `g 0 = 0`

```suggestion
  hasCompactSupport' := f.hasCompactSupport'.comp_left hg
```

```suggestion
    classical
    split hg
```
`split hg` fails... I use `by_cases`
What about `split_ifs`?
worked!

```suggestion
noncomputable def compLeft {Î³ : Type*} [TopologicalSpace Î³] [Zero Î³] (g : C(Î², Î³))
```

```suggestion
`g` sending `0` to `0` from the left yields another continuous function `g âˆ˜ f` with compact support.

 If `g` doesn't send `0` to `0`, `f.compLeft g` defaults to `0`. -/
```

```suggestion

lemma toContinuousMap_compLeft (hg : g 0 = 0) : (f.compLeft g).toContinuousMap = g.comp f := if_pos hg

lemma coe_compLeft (hg : g 0 = 0) : f.compLeft g = g âˆ˜ f := sorry

lemma compLeft_apply (hg : g 0 = 0) (a : Î±) : f.compLeft g a = g (f a) := sorry
```

```suggestion
open CompactlySupported
```

```suggestion
  toContinuousMap := by classical exact if g 0 = 0 then g.comp f else 0
```

```suggestion
If `g` doesn't send `0` to `0`, `f.compLeft g` defaults to `0`. -/
```

```suggestion
lemma compLeft_apply {g : C(Î², Î³)} (hg : g 0 = 0) (f : C_c(Î±, Î²)) (a : Î±) :
```

```suggestion
lemma coe_compLeft {g : C(Î², Î³)} (hg : g 0 = 0) (f : C_c(Î±, Î²)) : f.compLeft g = g âˆ˜ f := by
```

```suggestion
lemma toContinuousMap_compLeft {g : C(Î², Î³)} (hg : g 0 = 0) (f : C_c(Î±, Î²)) :
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Topology/ContinuousMap/CompactlySupported): left-composition with a continuous map

source.title: feat(Topology/ContinuousMap/CompactlySupported): turn a positive `Real`-linear functional into a `NNReal`-linear functional
